titles.title: Expressing support for designation of March 2014 as "Multiple System Atrophy Awareness Month" to increase public awareness of this progressive neurodegenerative disorder that affects the autonomic functions of the body.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/13/2014--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Multiple System Atrophy Awareness Month to increase public awareness of this progressive neurodegenerative disorder that affects the body's autonomic functions.
